group_1.textRight: but I feel like I'm looking back@on so many things all at once.

group_1.textCenter: ...I've always felt empty, no matter what I did,@even when I'm with family or friends.
It always felt like there's nowhere that I belong.
There was only one person who seemed@to share that feeling with me,
but that person got into an accident...
...The reason that I became a Magical Girl@was to be able to go to his side at once.
My wish was granted, but that@person is...no longer here...
I was hoping that...the place that I@belonged would be next to him.
But, since I didn't understand what@exactly that was, I was lost...
That's when I met Ayaka...@and got to know Ryo and Ikumi...
I started being able to laugh with them,
and thought that it was okay to not know@who I am or where I belong.
I came to think that it would be good if I could@cherish the time I have with everyone.
But, I didn't follow through with that thought, and@suddenly I lost two people precious to me...

group_1.textLeft: Is your despair a sense of loss?@Of helplessness?

group_1.textRight: When I saw that Witch painting, I felt so much pain...
...I realized that nothing lasts forever,@so I'll do what I can.
Even when I lose people important to me,@and it hurts,
I don't want to give up and make excuses@that they weren't meant to be with me,
...To be honest, I still don't know what I can do...
But I can always remember the@time I've spent with my loved ones,
and I want to keep a place for@them inside of me forever.
...I'm sure that wherever I am,@even if I'm alone someday,
they'll give me the courage to set out anywhere.

group_1.textLeft: So it's your memories that make you burn up.
I, Alina, think that's pretty cool.
